1. World's Largest Spider Web, Created By 111,000 Arachnids In A Cave, Is Big Enough To Catch A Whale  IFLScience
  2. World's biggest spiderweb discovered inside 'Sulfur Cave' with 111,000 arachnids living in pitch black  Live Science
  3. World’s largest web houses 110,000 spiders thriving in total darkness  New Atlas
  4. Sulfur cave spiders build an arachnid megacity and possibly the largest-ever spider web  Phys.org
  5. Arachnid Megacity Discovered in Cave May Be World's Largest Spider Web  ScienceAlert

item.title: 'I'm not going to represent our country there' — Trump to skip G20 summit, dashing hopes of brokering meeting between Zelensky, Putin - The Kyiv Independent
item.description:
1. 'I'm not going to represent our country there' — Trump to skip G20 summit, dashing hopes of brokering meeting between Zelensky, Putin  The Kyiv Independent
  2. Donald Trump wants South Africa out of the G20 as it gears up for world summit  BBC
  3. Trump, 79, Gets Basic Geography Wrong in Awkward Senior Moment  The Daily Beast
  4. Trump confuses South America and South Africa during speech in Miami  The Independent
  5. "South Africa shouldn't be in the Gs anymore": Trump on the G20  Newsweek

item.title: Russia sends disabled soldiers to the slaughter - Yahoo
item.description:
1. Russia sends disabled soldiers to the slaughter  Yahoo
